alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 2:32PM PST until December 08 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 21 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Curry County and Josephine County, South Central Oregon Cascades and Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of 5 to 8 inches every 12 hours area expected * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades
